sentences.en: We discovered him to be an imposter.

sentences.en: The two imposters tried to appear at their ease.
sentences.cn: 两个骗子装出安然无事的样子。

sentences.en: They consider him to be nothing but an imposter.

sentences.en: No imposter could deceive him;someone had put him up to all their tricks.
sentences.cn: 任何骗子也骗不了他,有人已经把他们的一切圈套告诉了他。
